# Aufgabe

Kann man die Anzahl gerade verliehener Fahrräder eines entsprechenden Anbieters anhand der Temperatur vorhersagen?

In dieser Übung untersuchen wir diese Frage.

Sie können die Daten von der [Webseite der UCI](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Bike+Sharing+Dataset#) herunterladen.

Wir beziehen uns auf den Datensatz `day`.

Berechnen Sie einen Entscheidungsbaum  mit der Anzahl der aktuell vermieteten Räder als AV und der aktuellen Temperatur als UV!

Tunen Sie den Cp-Parameter des Baumes; lassen Sie sich 20 Tuningparameter vorschlagen.

Geben Sie den MSE an!

[Hinweise](https://datenwerk.netlify.app/Hinweise.html)




</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_aee0be39ae762262470915e6816858d8'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(tictoc)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_417918c46f43d4c6d0e9d59d1aedfbdc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d <- read.csv("/Users/sebastiansaueruser/datasets/Bike-Sharing-Dataset/day.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_510e1e3534762ea5a809eabc43ccc4f1'}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(d)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

Columns: 16

$ hum        <dbl> 0.805833, 0.696087, 0.437273, 0.590435, 0.436957, 0.518261,…

$ registered <int> 654, 670, 1229, 1454, 1518, 1518, 1362, 891, 768, 1280, 122…
$ cnt        <int> 985, 801, 1349, 1562, 1600, 1606, 1510, 959, 822, 1321, 126…
```


:::
:::


## Data split


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_aa84d8b145a2ed6230521abca98dc372'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(42)
d_split <- initial_split(d, strata = cnt)

d_train <- training(d_split)
d_test <- testing(d_split)
```
:::




## Define recipe


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_4784fb5280e9ac044bd1083e727d7ba5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rec1 <- 
  recipe(cnt ~ temp, data = d)
```
:::




## Define model



::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_0d43e2f3d8b7d2c8f65ef7dbbc341346'}

```{.r .cell-code}
m1 <-
  decision_tree(cost_complexity = tune(),
                mode = "regression")
```
:::



## Tuning grid



::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_f4788e3d3ef185923c218f1a40779dcc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
grid <-
  grid_regular(cost_complexity(), levels = 20)
grid
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 20 × 1
   cost_complexity
             <dbl>
 1        1   e-10
 2        2.98e-10
 3        8.86e-10
 4        2.64e- 9
 5        7.85e- 9
 6        2.34e- 8
 7        6.95e- 8
 8        2.07e- 7
 9        6.16e- 7
10        1.83e- 6
11        5.46e- 6
12        1.62e- 5
13        4.83e- 5
14        1.44e- 4
15        4.28e- 4
16        1.27e- 3
17        3.79e- 3
18        1.13e- 2
19        3.36e- 2
20        1   e- 1
```


:::
:::


Alternativ:


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_68ff4b9327c58a7a6c937deb820a864e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
grid <-
  grid_regular(extract_parameter_set_dials(m1), levels = 20)
grid
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 20 × 1
   cost_complexity
             <dbl>
 1        1   e-10
 2        2.98e-10
 3        8.86e-10

 5        7.85e- 9
 6        2.34e- 8
 7        6.95e- 8

14        1.44e- 4

16        1.27e- 3

18        1.13e- 2

```


:::
:::



## Define Resamples


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_29d2b6d50fc33f7ea8c71927564edaa2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rsmpl <- vfold_cv(d_train)
```
:::



## Workflow



::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_55ee445072285324adf09ed07e06efc5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf1 <-
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(m1) %>% 
  add_recipe(rec1) 
```
:::




## Fit


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_aa7bc5056dccd4e2c6aa48e148775efd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tic()
fit1 <- tune_grid(
  object = wf1, 
  resamples = rsmpl)
toc()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
5.821 sec elapsed
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
fit1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# Tuning results
# 10-fold cross-validation

 2 <split [492/55]> Fold02 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>

 9 <split [493/54]> Fold09 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
10 <split [493/54]> Fold10 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
```


:::
:::



## Bester Kandidat


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_75b1df13e9fd46c300e664166cf518b3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
show_best(fit1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: No value of `metric` was given; metric 'rmse' will be used.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 5 × 7
  cost_complexity .metric .estimator  mean     n std_err .config              
            <dbl> <chr>   <chr>      <dbl> <int>   <dbl> <chr>                
1      0.0208     rmse    standard   1478.    10    34.7 Preprocessor1_Model09
2      0.00220    rmse    standard   1538.    10    36.4 Preprocessor1_Model01
3      0.000306   rmse    standard   1556.    10    40.3 Preprocessor1_Model07
4      0.00000175 rmse    standard   1558.    10    39.7 Preprocessor1_Model02
5      0.0000194  rmse    standard   1558.    10    39.7 Preprocessor1_Model03
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_030deec02db794e627fc6c0378d9b9ff'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf1_best <-
  wf1 %>% 
  finalize_workflow(parameters = select_best(fit1))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: No value of `metric` was given; metric 'rmse' will be used.
```


:::
:::



## Last Fit


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_9f7df39ff9b6d145b4a6c08360253f95'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_testsample <- last_fit(wf1_best, d_split)
```
:::




## Model performance (metrics) in test set


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_60760593a42d9c3966f6d8363f306e60'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_testsample %>% collect_metrics()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  .metric .estimator .estimate .config             
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>               
1 rmse    standard    1430.    Preprocessor1_Model1
2 rsq     standard       0.473 Preprocessor1_Model1
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-16_0d2c9ab71460d334e310bd3635c3fa32'}

```{.r .cell-code}
MSE <- fit_testsample %>% collect_metrics() %>% pluck(3, 1)
MSE
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1430.304
```


:::
:::
